brainly_data.question: Which sentence uses a compound subject? A) Social media is becoming both a bane and a benefit to both students and teachers in the classroom. B) Although the test was nearly impossible to complete, Professor Flores claimed that nobody failed the exam. C) The novelist gave a big sigh of relief after she finished her fourth (and in her opinion--her best) novel. Eliminate D) The large screen television and the state-of the-art sound system were the two biggest prizes on the game show.
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: Which sentence uses a compound subject? A) Social media is becoming both a bane and a benefit to both students and teachers in the classroom. B) Although the test was nearly impossible to complete, Professor Flores claimed that nobody failed the exam. C) The novelist gave a big sigh of relief after she finished her fourth (and in her opinion--her best) novel. Eliminate D) The large screen television and the state-of the-art sound system were the two biggest prizes on the game show.
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: A compound subject consists of two or more connected elements. Having that in mind, the correct answer is D) The large screen television and the state-of-the-art sound system were the two biggest prized on the game show.

top_answer.subject: English
